name: AutoTruthLens
description: Auto Truthlens is a little different from our TruthLens add-on. This add-on adds truthlens button on the page. Checks trueness as soon as you visit a page by sending the article link to Truthlens service. You don't have to press a button to check trueness in the Auto Truthlens add-on unlike the Truthlens add-on.
